title: Lotus Garden
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Casual restaurant offering Chinese and American-Chinese food. There are around 5 vegetarian specific entrees that happen to be vegan as well: ma po tofu, eggplant with garlic sauce, tofu with snow peas, mixed vegetables, and orange tofu. The spring rolls are vegan. There are other veggie-based dishes - ask your server which are vegan suitable. Portions are generous.
